Review.Titre: the Heater worked exactly two weeks and…
Review.Contenu: the Heater worked exactly two weeks and stopped dead and hasn't worked since! I have tried everything an no success getting it working. I have tried to reach the company several times and without being able to reach anyone.I need to return this item for replacement ASAP!

Review.Titre: Deliver was promt and on time but the…
Review.Contenu: Deliver was promt and on time but the heater was defective. It only worked for 1 day and the front didn't glow as the pictured. I've been contacting this company since the 19th to request a refund for the device I can no longer use. The emails are being returned and no one has responded to the inquiry that I submitted. Very dissatisfied with the outcome.

I received the request to provide a review and rating 6 days after I placed the order, which implies that I should have received my fan by now.  It is now 10 days after my order placement, and I have not received the fan, nor have I received notification that the fan has shipped.  I give a 1-star rating because there is no option to give a 0-star rating.

Review.Titre: USB Recharge port broke in less than a month.
Review.Contenu: I've had the fan for less than a month and the area to recharge it via USB has already broke and pushed in. The fan was great while it worked but I'm very disappointed it broke so quickly.

Review.Titre: Tried several times to cancel the order…
Review.Contenu: Tried several times to cancel the order before it shipped and no one would respond to my requests.
I need to return it.  The safety feature at the bottom..  The tip over feature.  The part is stuck up in thr heater and won't work.

Review.Titre: Only partial refund on order that I canceled
Review.Contenu: Accidentally ordered two orders canceled one. They were aware of it. They sent it out anyway it would not take the return and only gave me a partial refund.

Review.Titre: I had ordered a small wireless foldable…
Review.Contenu: I had ordered a small wireless foldable fan off of Amazon. Within a few weeks the fan broke. I contacted primevolve customer support. They responded very quickly. I was emailing with Nora Chau. She responded back fast and was pleasant  to communicate with. I had send some proof such as photos that fan broken. I was given a refund of 40% or have a new fan shipped. I chose the the new fan. I didn't have to return the old one. Was notified when the fan had been sent out. Overall this was one of my better experiences dealing with a company. Plus the I love the fan, great for my apartment.
Inexpensive doorbell with video. Great for the price! Video and functions a little slow, but worth it if you can't afford the better ones.
Great price. Fast delivery
Great fragrances.  Tins are absolutely beautiful. I bought a set for a friend and had to order one for myself.
Very easy ordering and adding promotional code. It shipped quickly and I received my order within just a couple of days.The candles are super pretty and the scents are amazing!

Review.Titre: The Candles are So Cute and Fragrant
Review.Contenu: The candles I received are so cute and smell so good! The best part is that shipping was incredibly fast. I ordered 3 sets and they all arrived within 2-3 days.
The company responded to my questions about my orders and sent me an update about my order. The camera was easy to install and has a very clear picture and wide viewing range.
New heater worked 1 day, after messaging 2 times i recieved a new heater expecting to send broke back...no return label, no headaceThanks for the smooth transition Appreciate

Website was easy to navigate.  The price on the beautiful box of candles was great!  The little tins are really pretty and the scents are varied and smell so nice.  I’m already on my third tin.  The delivery time was quicker than anticipated.  I’ll be checking this website for more great deals.  Thank you!
I purchased the small candles in the beautifully decorated tins, all 12 decorated differently.  The candles smell so good. I loved these so much, I ordered two more for my two daughters.
Great gifts, beautiful packaging, very good price. Shipping was quick and seems to be a wonderful product. Thank you for such a smooth transaction.

I love this little device. I purchased this fan to keep my maltipoo puppy cool in his crate. It has been working perfectly. I love that I can adjust the settings from low to high and it performs at each level.

Review.Titre: I've only lit one of the candles so far…
Review.Contenu: I've only lit one of the candles so far but it's very nice-smelling. The jars are really cute and the packaging is beautiful. I will have to find some good purpose for the box because it's too pretty to throw out.  :)
